Name: Social Media Management
Short description: Manage your social media presence with expert content creation and community engagement.
Description:
Social Media Management Service

Transform your social media presence with our comprehensive management service. We handle everything from content creation to community engagement, helping you build a strong online presence that drives real business results.

What's Included:

  • Daily posts on 2-3 platforms - Consistent, engaging content across your chosen social media channels
  • Community engagement - Active response to comments, messages, and interactions with your audience
  • Monthly performance report - Detailed analytics and insights to track your growth and ROI
  • Content calendar planning - Strategic post scheduling for optimal engagement
  • Brand-consistent visuals - Professional graphics and imagery that align with your brand

Perfect For:

  • Small to medium businesses looking to establish social media presence
  • Companies wanting to increase brand awareness and engagement
  • Businesses seeking to generate leads through social media

Delivery: Service begins within 2-3 business days of order confirmation. Monthly reports delivered on the 1st of each month.
Tags: social media, management, content creation, community engagement

Name: SEO Optimization
Short description: Improve your website's visibility in search engine results with comprehensive SEO strategies.
Description:
SEO Optimization Service

Boost your website's search engine rankings with our comprehensive SEO optimization service. Our data-driven approach ensures your business gets found by potential customers when they search for your products or services.

What's Included:

  • Keyword research & strategy - Identify high-value keywords your customers are searching for
  • On-page optimization - Optimize your website content, meta tags, and structure for search engines
  • Technical SEO audit - Comprehensive analysis and fixes for technical SEO issues
  • Competitor analysis - Understand what your competitors are doing and how to outrank them
  • Monthly progress reports - Track your rankings, traffic, and conversions

Perfect For:

  • Businesses wanting to increase organic website traffic
  • Companies looking to improve their Google search rankings
  • Organizations seeking long-term, sustainable marketing growth

Delivery: Initial audit and strategy delivered within 5-7 business days. Optimization work begins immediately after approval.
Tags: seo, optimization, search engine, keyword research, rankings

Name: Content Creation
Short description: Engaging blog posts, articles, and website copy to attract and convert customers.
Description:
Content Creation Service

Fuel your marketing efforts with high-quality, engaging content that attracts your ideal customers and drives conversions. Our expert writers create content that not only informs but also persuades and converts.

What's Included:

  • 4 blog posts (500-800 words each) - Well-researched, engaging articles tailored to your audience
  • Topic research & strategy - Data-driven content planning that aligns with your business goals
  • SEO optimization - Every piece is optimized for search engines to increase organic visibility
  • Custom graphics - Eye-catching featured images and social media graphics for each post
  • Content calendar - Strategic publishing schedule for maximum impact

Perfect For:

  • Businesses wanting to establish thought leadership in their industry
  • Companies looking to improve their website's SEO through content
  • Organizations seeking to nurture leads through valuable content

Delivery: First draft delivered within 7-10 business days. All content delivered within 2 weeks of order confirmation.
Tags: content creation, blog posts, copywriting, seo content

Name: Email Marketing Campaign
Short description: Targeted email campaigns with professional design, compelling copy, and automation.
Description:
Email Marketing Campaign Service

Reach your customers directly with professionally designed email campaigns that drive engagement and sales. Our comprehensive email marketing service handles everything from design to deployment and tracking.

What's Included:

  • Email template design - Custom, mobile-responsive templates that reflect your brand
  • Campaign setup & deployment - Complete campaign configuration and sending
  • Performance tracking - Detailed analytics on opens, clicks, and conversions
  • List segmentation - Target specific customer groups with personalized messaging
  • A/B testing - Optimize subject lines and content for better performance

Perfect For:

  • Businesses with existing customer databases looking to increase repeat sales
  • Companies wanting to nurture leads through automated sequences
  • Organizations seeking to improve customer retention and lifetime value

Delivery: Campaign setup completed within 3-5 business days. First campaign sent within 1 week of approval.

Name: PPC Management
Short description: Professional Google Ads and social media advertising management to maximize ROI.
Description:
PPC Management Service

Drive immediate traffic and conversions with professionally managed pay-per-click advertising campaigns. Our PPC experts optimize your ad spend to deliver maximum ROI across Google Ads and social media platforms.

What's Included:

  • Campaign setup & optimization - Complete account setup with conversion tracking and optimization
  • Keyword research & bidding - Strategic keyword selection and bid management for optimal ROI
  • Monthly performance reports - Detailed analytics showing spend, conversions, and ROI
  • Ad copy creation - Compelling ad text designed to maximize click-through rates
  • Landing page recommendations - Suggestions to improve conversion rates

Perfect For:

  • Businesses wanting immediate visibility in search results
  • Companies with clear conversion goals and tracking
  • Organizations looking to scale their online advertising profitably

Delivery: Campaign setup completed within 3-5 business days. Full optimization begins immediately after launch.

Note: This service fee covers management only. Your advertising budget is separate and will be discussed during onboarding.
Tags: ppc, google ads, paid advertising, campaign management
